response.original_title: Uncle Nick and the Magic Forest: Vol. 1: Poco and Friends
response.overview: Joined by furry buddies O.D. Coyote, Flora Flower and Chee Chee Bea Birdie, Uncle Nick Felix -- the award-winning choreographer of the "Barney & Friends" series -- leads kids on a song-and-dance-filled journey through the woods of the Magic Forest. Geared towards kid ages 2 though 8, this vibrant program is designed to boost self-esteem, encourage physical activity and foster creativity and expression.
response.title: Uncle Nick and the Magic Forest: Vol. 1: Poco and Friends
